knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r, libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(tigris)
library(sf)
```

```{r, reading in homicide csv}
homicides <- read_csv("../data/homicide-data.csv")
```

```{r, filtering to Oakland, CA}
oak_homicides <- homicides %>% 
  filter(city == "Oakland")
```

```{r}
oak_homicides <- st_as_sf(oak_homicides, coords = c("lon", "lat")) %>% 
  st_set_crs(4269)
```

```{r, oakland sf}
oakland <- places(state = "CA", 
                           cb = TRUE, 
                           class = "sf") %>% 
  filter(NAME == "Oakland")

alameda_bg <- block_groups(state = "CA", 
                           county = "Alameda", 
                           cb = TRUE, 
                           class = "sf")

oakland_bg <- st_filter(alameda_bg, oakland)
plot(oakland_bg)

```

```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = oakland_bg, aes()) +
  geom_sf(data = oak_homicides, aes(color = disposition))
```
